item.title: The first post
item.description: Moving to self-host server at last I find that I have a free raspberry pi 3+ machine, so let’s build self-host server. Prerequisite: 1. raspberry pi 3+ 2. public ip(if you use uqmobile wifi router, open service by the following guide https://www.uqwimax.jp/plan/wimax/option/global_ip/ Install apache2, mysql, php, wordpress on raspberry pi and configure them properly, you may refer this manual: https://projects.raspberrypi.org/en/projects/lamp-web-server-with-wordpress If ssl is required, using letsencrpyt https://letsencrypt.org/ to automatically generate ssl certificate for the website without charge.
